short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display the current Tailwind CSS breakpoint and viewport width in a draggable indicator

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**Tailwind Breakpoint Viewer** is the must-have tool for developers using Tailwind CSS. This lightweight and intuitive extension allows you to see the active Tailwind breakpoint in real-time and the exact width of your window.

üéØ **KEY FEATURES**  
‚Ä¢ Real-time display of the current Tailwind breakpoint (xs, sm, md, lg, xl, 2xl)  
‚Ä¢ Accurate window width indication in pixels  
‚Ä¢ Minimalist and elegant interface  
‚Ä¢ Movable indicator via drag-and-drop  
‚Ä¢ Instant on/off toggle with a single click  

üìè **TAILWIND BREAKPOINTS INCLUDED**  
‚Ä¢ xs: < 640px  
‚Ä¢ sm: ‚â• 640px  
‚Ä¢ md: ‚â• 768px  
‚Ä¢ lg: ‚â• 1024px  
‚Ä¢ xl: ‚â• 1280px  
‚Ä¢ 2xl: ‚â• 1536px  

üí° **SIMPLE TO USE**  
1. Click on the extension icon  
2. The indicator appears at the bottom right  
3. Drag it to wherever you prefer  
4. Click the icon again to hide it  

üé® **PERFECT FOR**  
‚Ä¢ Front-end developers  
‚Ä¢ Web integrators  
‚Ä¢ UI/UX designers  
‚Ä¢ Any Tailwind CSS user  

Optimize your responsive development workflow with Tailwind Breakpoint Viewer!
